note: My name is Tim and I'm from The Netherlands. Next to my job in the chemical industry, I am interested in classical, progressive and electronical music. As an amateur, I play percussion in a local band. At home I like to tweak my DAW #Logic and my #Modwave to explore and extend my sound and musical experience.
